item.description: miriahpeterson.com Miriah Peterson graduated from Brigham Young University in 2017 with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Physics. She attended one semester of graduate school at the University of Oklahoma in 2017, but dropped out to start a career as a software engineer. She is currently a Member of Technical Staff at Tailscale. Sharing knowledge and experiences is a focus Miriah’s career. She has given many talks on the Go Programming, machine learning, data engineering, and data architecture strategy.
